projects.name: VR Western Shootout
projects.description: A Virtual Reality Game where one could live their old western fantasies! This was my first video game produced in the Unity engine using C# Scripting.

projects.name: Based on Books
projects.description: A web application that uses 2 different databases to search if a piece of media is based on books. This is my first project that uses an API to manipulate a JSON.
